verse:
यदा पश्यः पश्यते रुक्मवर्णं कर्तारमीशं पुरुषं ब्रह्मयोनिम्‌।
तदा विद्वान्‌ पुण्यपापे विधूय निरञ्जनः परमं साम्यमुपैति ॥

terms.कर्तारमीशं: the Lord, the Creator, the Supreme Being

meaning: When a person sees the golden complexioned Lord, the Creator, the source of creation, then the wise person, having washed away the effects of good and evil deeds, attains the supreme state of pure equanimity.
